|1effect=If a skill compares unit's Res to a foe's or ally's Res, treats unit's Res as if granted +5. Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat. If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).<br><br>Foes with Range = 2 cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains).
|1cost=400
|1required=Dragon Wall 3
}}
